meanings.definition: A software designed to detect and remove computer viruses.
meanings.sent1: I installed antiviruses on my computer to keep it safe from harmful software.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to regularly update your antiviruses to protect your device.
meanings.sent3: The antiviruses on my laptop work harder than a detective solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her diligence in running antiviruses was like a shield against invisible threats.
meanings.sent5: The glowing shield of antiviruses surrounded the computer, repelling any intruders.

meanings.definition: Agents that inhibit the growth or multiplication of viruses.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use antiviruses to help patients fight off harmful infections.
meanings.sent2: Antiviruses can be crucial in stopping the spread of contagious illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The antiviruses in the body acted like tiny superheroes fighting off invaders.
meanings.sent4: The antiviruses worked tirelessly, like guardians protecting the body from harm.
meanings.sent5: The army of antiviruses battled the viruses, ensuring the body's safety.
